Remarks: Drop-dead gorgeous views of Grant Park, Lake Michigan & the Chicago skyline.  HUGE 2 Bed + den/office, 2 bath.  The most in-demand floor plan at The Grant - South Loop's premier address. Listed less than the similar developer units + has $15K in upgrades included. Stunning new "Signature" finishes throughout: Quartz counters, Snaidero cabinets, Built-in Sub Zero, Wolf range, etc. Garage parking included!
